articles.title: Musk Accuses Apple of Antitrust Violation, Threatens Legal Action
articles.summary: Elon Musk says Apple is engaging in antitrust violations by allegedly making it impossible for any artificial intelligence company other than OpenAI to reach the No. 1 spot in its App Store rankings, calling it an unequivocal antitrust violation.
articles.translated_title: Musk Accuses Apple of Antitrust Violation, Threatens Legal Action
articles.translated_summary: Elon Musk says Apple is engaging in antitrust violations by allegedly making it impossible for any artificial intelligence company other than OpenAI to reach the No. 1 spot in its App Store rankings, calling it an unequivocal antitrust violation.

articles.title: Free AI training comes to California colleges - but at what cost?
articles.summary: As artificial intelligence replaces entry-level jobs, California’s universities and community colleges are offering a glimmer of hope for students: free AI training that will teach them to master the new technology.
articles.translated_title: Free AI training comes to California colleges - but at what cost?
articles.translated_summary: As artificial intelligence replaces entry-level jobs, California’s universities and community colleges are offering a glimmer of hope for students: free AI training that will teach them to master the new technology.

articles.title: Cerence AI CEO explains how new tech can help drivers
articles.summary: In a Monday interview with CNBC's Jim Cramer, Cerence AI CEO Brian Krzanich explained how new artificial intelligence technology can help automobile drivers.
articles.translated_title: Cerence AI CEO explains how new tech can help drivers
articles.translated_summary: In a Monday interview with CNBC's Jim Cramer, Cerence AI CEO Brian Krzanich explained how new artificial intelligence technology can help automobile drivers.

articles.title: Nvidia, AMD AI Deal, Intel CEO to Meet Trump | Bloomberg Tech 8/11/2025
articles.summary: Bloomberg’s Caroline Hyde and Ed Ludlow discuss Nvidia’s and AMD’s agreement to pay 15% of their revenues from Chinese artificial intelligence chip sales to the US government. Analysts and investors react to the “unprecedented” deal. Plus, Intel CEO Lip-Bu Tan is set to meet with President Donald Trump, after the US leader called his resignation.  (Source: Bloomberg)
articles.translated_title: Nvidia, AMD AI Deal, Intel CEO to Meet Trump | Bloomberg Tech 8/11/2025
articles.translated_summary: Bloomberg’s Caroline Hyde and Ed Ludlow discuss Nvidia’s and AMD’s agreement to pay 15% of their revenues from Chinese artificial intelligence chip sales to the US government. Analysts and investors react to the “unprecedented” deal. Plus, Intel CEO Lip-Bu Tan is set to meet with President Donald Trump, after the US leader called his resignation.  (Source: Bloomberg)

articles.title: GitHub CEO Thomas Dohmke steps down to launch new startup
articles.summary: Thomas Dohmke is leaving GitHub at the end of the year, closing a chapter that saw the Microsoft-owned platform double down on artificial intelligence and grow its global footprint, Axios said in an exclusive report. articles.title: Bitcoin-Miner MARA Said to Near $168 Million Deal for EDF Unit
articles.summary: MARA Holdings Inc. has agreed to acquire a majority stake in Exaion from Electricite de France SA as the largest Bitcoin miner looks to extend its reach into artificial intelligence as an infrastructure provider.
articles.translated_title: Bitcoin-Miner MARA Said to Near $168 Million Deal for EDF Unit
articles.translated_summary: MARA Holdings Inc. has agreed to acquire a majority stake in Exaion from Electricite de France SA as the largest Bitcoin miner looks to extend its reach into artificial intelligence as an infrastructure provider.

articles.title: Trump opens door to sales of version of Nvidia's next-gen AI chips in China
articles.summary: U.S. President Donald Trump on Monday suggested he might allow Nvidia to sell a scaled-down version of its next-generation advanced GPU chip in China, despite deep-seated fears in Washington that China could harness American artificial intelligence capabilities to supercharge its military.
articles.translated_title: Trump opens door to sales of version of Nvidia's next-gen AI chips in China
articles.translated_summary: U.S. President Donald Trump on Monday suggested he might allow Nvidia to sell a scaled-down version of its next-generation advanced GPU chip in China, despite deep-seated fears in Washington that China could harness American artificial intelligence capabilities to supercharge its military.

articles.title: Micron raises forecasts as AI boosts memory chip demand
articles.summary: Micron Technology on Monday raised its forecast for fourth-quarter revenue and adjusted profit, banking on surging demand for its memory chips used in artificial intelligence infrastructure, sending its shares up about 3%.
articles.translated_title: Micron raises forecasts as AI boosts memory chip demand

articles.title: 'Alien: Earth' star Timothy Olyphant: Scary AI tech is on our doorstep
articles.summary: Timothy Olyphant told UPI playing Kirsh on "Alien: Earth" made him realize just how fast artificial intelligence technology is advancing in the real world.
articles.translated_title: 'Alien: Earth' star Timothy Olyphant: Scary AI tech is on our doorstep

articles.title: Medicare Update: Major Change Sparks Alarm from Lawmakers
articles.summary: The new model incorporates artificial intelligence to help make decisions and is being tested in six states beginning in January.
